products.name: Kiehls Nourishing Olive Fruit Oil Conditioner
products.description:
A lightweight conditioner for dry hair.
Enriched with Olive Fruit and Avocado Oils, this lightweight conditioner nourishes hair for a shiny and healthy appearance. Nurture and moisturize with our lightweight conditioner for dry hair. Moisturizes and conditions dry hair
Helps detangle and improve hair’s manageability and suppleness
Lightweight formula rinses easily and helps promote shine
For under-nourished and dry hair
Olive Fruit Oil is obtained by cold pressing ripe olives. This extra virgin oil contains fatty acids and Vitamin E. Within our formulas, it is known to nourish and moisturize skin and hair.
products.introduction: The Football Is Good For Training And Recreational Purposes
products.ingredient: Water, Propylene Glycol, Squalane, Coco Caprylate/Caprate, Niacinamide, Saccharide Isomerate, Caprylyl Methicone, Pentylene Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Withania Somnifera (Ashwagandha) Root Extract, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Caffeine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glucosyl Hesperidin, Bio-Saccharide Gum-1, Melissa Officinalis (Lemon Balm) Leaf Extract, Hordeum Distichon (Barley) Extract, Caesalpinia Spinosa (Tara) Fruit Pod Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Sprout Extract, Glyceryl Monostearate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Fructose, Glycerin, Cetearyl alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Tocopheryl Acetate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Sodium Gluconate, Fragrance, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate
products.detail:
Ashwagandha Bounce is a rich yet lightweight moisturiser packed with the refreshing goodness of ashwagandha and sodium hyaluronate. Perfect for daily use, this rejuvenating moisturiser is clinically proven to hydrate and restore your skin to a glowing and naturally healthy state.
 
 By bringing together ashwagandha, which aids in collagen production and restores skin elasticity and sodium hyaluronate, which works to store moisture in your skin for long-lasting hydration, this clinically-proven moisturiser visibly improves your skin's clarity and firmness in just one week
products.howToUse: After cleansing and toning, scoop out a coin-sized amount of Ashwagandha Bounce into the palm of your hand. Massage gently onto your face and neck in upward strokes. Follow with Patchouli Glow nourishing sunscreen drops for a simple and effective everyday routine that cares for the health of your skin.

products.name: Requill Babassu Anti-Frizz & Smoothening Hair Conditioner
products.description:
For frizzy hair, pH 4.5 - 5.5, safety tested, clinically proven ingredients, paraben freeA conditioner that retains moisture and tames the frizz.
If your hair fails to hydrate no matter what you try to put into them. Even water cannot penetrate and tends to bead off. Chances are high, you have low porosity hair. Result - Frizzy hair. Heat treatment may appear to help but it is not the solution. Nor are protein-based conditioners. Frizzy hair needs conditioning agents that are lightweight, do not evaporate,  and lock in the moisture on the hair strand. Low porosity frizzy hair needs hydration that stays.

products.name: Kiehls Amino Acid Shampoo
products.description:
A mild shampoo with Coconut Oil and Amino Acids that cleanses and softens hair.

This gentle shampoo with Coconut Oil and Amino Acids effectively helps to add body and fullness. Cleanse your hair with a mild shampoo that helps soften and add shine.

When chemically united with fatty alcohol or fatty acid, Amino Acids have cleansing properties. Within our formulas, they are known to help retain moisture.

Coconut Oil is derived from the Coconut Tree, known as the “tree of life.” Used in Ayurvedic medicine for over 4,000 years, Coconut Oil is rich in fatty acids and known to nourish, hydrate and soften.

products.name: Requill Murumuru Damage Repair Hair Conditioner
products.description:
For all hair types, pH 4.5 - 5.5, safety tested, clinically proven ingredients, paraben free
Our hair change the way we look and more importantly how we feel. Dry, damaged, split ended hair is nobody’s dream. Imagine how it feels to run your fingers through hair that is healthy, voluminous, shiny and well defined. That's a dream you can live. Whether you have normal, straight or curly hair, your hair deserves deep conditioning that does not cause any silicone build-up or does not make your hair frizzy after a few uses.

products.name: Ever Eden Kids Multi-Vitamin Shampoo & Conditioner
products.description:
HEALTHY HAIR STARTS WITH A HEALTHY SCALP

All-in-one formula with MegaVitamin Complex™ creates a healthy foundation for kids’ scalp and hair. Contains both biotin and amino acids to strengthen and condition hair while maiden hair fern and wild thyme extracts provide a gentle, yet long lasting cleansing effect. Gluten-free. 

Formulated for children ages 4+, but can be used by the whole family. Choose between our three 100% natural scents: Cool Peach, Fresh Pomelo, and Melon Juice. 10.1 fl. oz. / 300 ml.

products.name: Tinted Moisturiser
products.description:
Revolutionary pro-melanin care formula with the right balance of vitamins, prebiotics and natural ingredients that combine to deliver to the specific needs of all brown skin
Easy blend formula that gives an even tone, moisturises, blocks upto 97% UV rays and tackles hyperpigmentation
Light-feel product that works well in Indian weather conditions and suits all skin types
Available in a 50 ml pack.

Vitamins with their potent antioxidant action help keep hyperpigmentation at bay. Prebiotics derived from nature promote good bacteria to keep skin healthy. Hibiscus adds a nourishing touch to leave skin soft and supple.

products.name: Gotu Kola Dew
products.description:
Revitalizing toner serum with Gotu Kola and Niacinamide

Gotu Kola Dew is a fast-absorbing toner serum infused with the invigorating properties of gotu kola and niacinamide. Its multitasking formulation is clinically proven to leave you with bright and clear skin by providing an instant boost of hydration and reducing the appearance of pores (1).

Gotu Kola is known to aid in collagen production and minimize premature signs of aging like dull skin, dark spots, and fine lines. It is packed with antioxidants and helps the skin retain moisture.

Niacinamide helps in regulating melanin production to give skin an even tone. This versatile ingredient is known to regulate oil produced from the sebaceous glands and to help restore the skin’s natural barrier against moisture loss and dehydration.

Suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin.

products.name: Ashwagandha Bounce
products.description:
Rejuvenating moisturiser with ashwagandha and sodium hyaluronate

Ashwagandha Bounce is a rich yet lightweight moisturiser packed with the refreshing goodness of ashwagandha and sodium hyaluronate. Perfect for daily use, this rejuvenating moisturiser is clinically proven to hydrate and restore your skin to a glowing and naturally healthy state.


 By bringing together ashwagandha, which aids in collagen production and restores skin elasticity and sodium hyaluronate, which works to store moisture in your skin for long-lasting hydration, this clinically-proven moisturiser visibly improves your skin’s clarity and firmness in just one week(1).

Sodium hyaluronate (soh·dee·uhm/ hye.a.loo.roe.nate), is a powerful compound that stores moisture in the skin for long-lasting hydration. It is excellent in controlling the effects of dryness to give you balanced and dewy skin. We use a blend of low and high-molecular-weight Sodium HA to give you instant moisturization as well as deeper hydration over time.

products.name: Kiehls Avocado Eye Cream
products.description:
Our #1 hydrating eye cream delivers a pop of energy for tired, fatigued eyes. Formulated with Avocado Oil, Beta-Carotene, and Sodium & Copper PCA, this brightening eye cream immediately improves the look and feel of under eye texture and dry fine lines through all day hydration.

Paraben-free, fragrance-free, silicone-free, mineral oil-free, and synthetic dye-free.

Derived from the beloved Avocado Fruit, Avocado Oil has a rich, emollient texture and contains a balance of lipids including omega essential fatty acids. Within our formula, the use of renewable Avocado Oil is known to moisturize, nourish and soften skin.

products.description:
Our refreshing face wash for men effectively removes debris, dirt and oil with a non-drying cleanse. With Caffeine, Menthol and Vitamin E, this men’s facial cleanser is an energizing way to start the day.

Paraben-free and Alcohol-free.

Caffeine is an alkaloid known for its stimulating properties. In our formulas, it helps energize and reduce dullness.

Menthol is an invigorating ingredient known to provide an instant refreshing feeling to skin.

products.name: Turmeric Shield
products.description:
Soothing sunscreen serum with Turmeric and Ceramides

Turmeric Shield SPF 40 PA+++ is a lightweight sunscreen serum packed with the healing properties of turmeric and ceramides. Its fast-absorbing, fragrance-free formulation protects against skin damage caused by UVA/UVB rays due to sun exposure and is clinically tested to leave your skin hydrated, healthy and glowing.

Turmeric is a potent ingredient known for its antioxidant properties that help to soothe irritable skin. It is also known to revive dry and dull skin by protecting it against harsh free radicals and environmental stressors like dirt, dust and pollution, and giving it a healthy and youthful glow.

Ceramides (cer.am.ides) help to replenish the skin’s natural lipid levels to trap moisture in the skin. By doing so, they protect the skin’s barrier against damage caused by harmful external elements.

Turmeric Shield SPF 40 PA+++ broad-spectrum sunscreen offers protection against UVA and UVB rays. The UV filters in our sunscreen are also known to offer protection from blue light.

 By bringing together ashwagandha, which aids in collagen production and restores skin elasticity and sodium hyaluronate, which works to store moisture in your skin for long-lasting hydration, this clinically-proven moisturiser visibly improves your skin’s clarity and firmness in just one week
products.howToUse: After cleansing and toning, scoop out a coin-sized amount of Ashwagandha Bounce into the palm of your hand. Massage gently onto your face and neck in upward strokes. Follow with Patchouli Glow nourishing sunscreen drops for a simple and effective everyday routine that cares for the health of your skin.

products.name: Requill Sheer Zinc Tinted Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 PA+++
products.description: For all skin types, anhydrous formulation, safety tested, clinically proven ingredients, paraben free. They told you to wear sunscreen and why it was the most important thing. The best anti-ageing product and You tried it.  Honestly and religiously. Yet you couldn't continue because it irritated your sensitive skin. Re’equil Sheer Zinc Sunscreen is designed for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Mineral sun protection with a perfect matte texture and universal tint.

products.name: Ever Eden Nourishing Baby Face Cream
products.description:
The naturally-derived, nutrient-rich face cream that does it all: deeply-hydrates, soothes, strengthens and smooths.

Inspired by the nature of babies' delicate skin; babies' faces are often drier than the rest of their bodies and are in need of intensive moisture and soothing care. Skin-sensitivities don't stop at delicate baby skin, they commonly extend into adulthood, making this a great daily moisturizer for the entire family.

This deeply hydrating, yet fast-absorbing cream is loaded with superfood oils that nourish and soothe dry, sensitive skin with 72-hour hydration- for babies and sensitive adults alike. With continuous use, skin's barrier is strengthened and skin appears softer and smoother.

Adult Tip: Perfectly preps and primes dry skin for even application of makeup and can help soothe skin after shaving!

products.name: Ever Eden Premium Mineral Sunscreen SPF30
products.description:
A daily essential to protect delicate baby and kid skin from the sun’s damaging effects, all-year round. This quick-absorbing, 100% mineral-based sunscreen, formulated with non-nano zinc oxide, skin nourishing sunflower and jojoba oils, gives skin the necessary protection and care it needs. Perfectly pairs as the last step in children's daily routine.
100% MINERAL-BASED SUNSCREEN TO HELP PROTECT CHILDREN'S SKIN 365 DAYS A YEAR

100% non-nano zinc-oxide
Broad-spectrum UVA/UVB SPF30 protection
Non-streaky with no white cast
100% natural fresh cucumber scent
Suitable for face and body
Reef-friendly (made without any chemical ingredients including oxybenzone and octinoxate)

products.name: Kiehls Body Fuel Wash
products.description:
An invigorating hair and body wash for men for head-to-toe cleansing.

Infused with Menthol and Caffeine, this efficient body wash is also formulated with Vitamin E, Vitamin C and Zinc. Start your morning with our all-in-one energizing hair and body wash for men. With an uplifting aroma, this versatile body cleanser will kick-start your senses for optimal performance.

Gently removes excess oil, sweat and impurities
Cleanses and conditions skin and scalp, leaving them invigorated and refreshed
Packed with the power of a body wash and shampoo all-in-one
For men’s skin and hair

Zinc Gluconate, a compound of the essential mineral Zinc, is known for its purifying and soothing properties.
